connection.name: Campus6
connection.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) as AidApps FROM stu_award_year WHERE award_year_token = ${year}-1
SELECT dict_token as name, tabname + '.' + colname as value from dict_stu where dict_token in (${text})

select sel_set_year_token as name, 'select distinct stu_award_year.stu_award_year_token into lcu_fads_students from ' + ' ' + cast(sel_set_from as varchar(max)) + ' where ' + cast(sel_set_where as varchar(max)) as value from sel_set_year where award_year_token = ${year}-1 and sel_set_year_token in (${selectionSetToken})

select 'F' as [TYPE], ${fice} as [FICE], ${year} as [YEAR], [SOC_SEC_NUMBER], STDNT_SPOUSE_AGI, PARENT_AGI, TOP10PCT, 0 as fill1, 0 as fill2, 0 as fill3, 0 as fill4, s.race as RACE, 0 as fill5, 0 as fill6, 0 as fill7, ISIR_VALID, HOUSING, ETHNIC, RACE_CODE, [CLASSIFICATION], [DEPENDENCY_STATUS], [DATE_OF_BIRTH], [RESIDENCY], ' ' as fill8, ' ' as fill9, [ZIP_ADDRESS], [ENROLLMENT_STATUS], [GENDER], [MOTHER_HIGH_GRADE], [FATHER_HIGH_GRADE], [COST_OF_ATTEND], [TOTAL_FAMILY_CONT],
case when [STDNT_WORK_INCOME] < 0 then 0 else [STDNT_WORK_INCOME] end as [STDNT_WORK_INCOME], [SPOUSE_WK_INCOME], [SOC_SEC_BENEFITS], [AFDC_ADC], [CHILD_SUPPORT], [OTHER_INCOME_BENE], [FATHERS_WK_INCOME], [MOTHERS_WK_INCOME], [PAR_SOC_SEC_BENE], [PARENTS_AFDC_ADC], [PARENT_CHILD_SUPP], [PAR_INCOME_BENEF], [ETHNIC_ORIGIN], [LOCATION_CODE], [STREET_ADDRESS], [CITY_ADDRESS], [TUIT_EXEMPT_WAIV], [CATEGORICAL_AID], [FEDERAL_PELL], [FEDERAL_SEOG], [TPEG_ON_CAMPUS], [SMART_GRANT], [TEG_PRIVATE_SCHL], [LEAP], [HB3015_GRANTS], [PRIVATESCH], [MERIT_BY_INST], [BYRD_SCHOLARSHIP], [STATE_NURSE_SCHLR], [STUDENT_DEP_SCHLR], [ACG], [OTHER_SCHLR_GRANT], [TEXAS_GRANT_PGM], [TEOG], [FEDERAL_SLEAP], [FEDERAL_WK_STUDY], [TEXAS_WORK_STUDY], [NEED_BASED_INST], [AMERICORPS], [HB3015_WS], null as [TXWS_MENTORSHIP], [SUBS_STAFFORD_LN], [UNSUB_STAFFORD_LN], [PERKINS_LOAN], [FEDERAL_PLUS_LNS], [HELP], [COLLEGE_ACCESS_LN], [PRIM_CARE_STD_LN], null as [INCOME_CONTIG_LNS], [FDSLP_SUB], [OTHER_LT_LOANS], [UNSUB_FED_DIR_LNS], [BOT], [HB3015_LOANS], [TEACH], [HB3015_OTHER], [ENROLL_ADJ_COA], [ENROLL_ADJ_TFC], case when ssn is null or len(ssn) < 9 then alt_id else '' end as ALT_ID from lcu_fads_base_info s join lcu_fads_totals t on t.ssn = s.SOC_SEC_NUMBER order by s.last_name, s.first_name, s.middle_init
